name: Samsung DeX
desc: Extend some Samsung devices into a desktop-like experience
caveats:
samsung-dex has been officially discontinued upstream.
It may stop working correctly (or at all) in recent versions of macOS.

samsung-dex requires a kernel extension to work.
If the installation fails, retry after you enable it in:
  System Preferences → Security & Privacy → General

For more information, refer to vendor documentation or this Apple Technical Note:
  https://developer.apple.com/library/content/technotes/tn2459/_index.html

You must reboot for the installation of samsung-dex to take effect.
